nodes.body: {🎮 demos} Meepalasheep released a demo for GingerSnap! [link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dC7KJq5U9Xw)

{🎷 music} Otome visual novel _Keepers of Astraela_ released a [new video trailer](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2445090/Keepers_of_Astraela/) on Steam with music from composer [rosko vair](https://roskovair.itch.io) and local violinist [Abby Meyers](https://www.instagram.com/abbyxmeyers/).

{📼 videos} Watch some gameplay of [Hive Jump 2: Survivors](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2545740/Hive_Jump_2_Survivors/):
[OverageGmngCom](https://www.youtube.com/@overagegmngcom) - [Here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w0n5sTqWTBo) & [Levelation](https://www.youtube.com/@Levelation) - [Here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XQLNpXfRodc)
{🎲 random} [#PitchYaGame](https://x.com/hashtag/PitchYaGame) happened June 7th over on The Site Formerly Known as Twitter - check out all the cool games that were pitched!

{📅 events} If you are reading this today (June 12, 2024), the [June Game Dev DrinkUp](https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/301178605/) is happening TOMORROW NIGHT! Come hang out and chat about making games with like-minded developers! It's Free (except for any food/drink you buy) and it's fun!
{📅 events} Don't forget about [the next Share & Play event](https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/300761567/) - happening June 30th at Washington University, St Louis!
{!header} It's that time again! Another Game Dev RoundUp for your eyeballs! Come hang out with us tomorrow night! 🍻
